name: Bubby's Tool Factory
description:
NOTE: Hey, the game has a lot more development put into it than meets the eye. If you're rating, I would greatly appreciate if you could make it to day 9 and/or check the credits sequence. I didn't want to put any of that stuff on the game page because it'd lessen the surprise.

Welcome to the tool factory!

Don't let this game's innocent artstyle fool you, this game can get pretty challenging!

Use your reflexes and multi-tasking skills to get through each job.

Good luck beating the 15 increasingly difficult levels!

Oh, and watch out for the twist.

Controls:

Left & Right click - Advance the production line

R - Restart the level

Ctrl + W - Change the resolution

This is my first ever game jam submission, so I hope you enjoy it!

Made in 72 hours with the theme "Out of place", and submitted to the Completion Jam hosted by Deynum.
